eventDecorators.name: FoundationChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an upgrade path is removed.

eventDecorators.name: LiquidationFeeChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an upgrade path is removed.

eventDecorators.name: ManagerAdded
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an upgrade path is removed.

eventDecorators.name: ManagerRemoved
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an upgrade path is removed.

eventDecorators.name: OracleTypeDisabled
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an upgrade path is removed.

eventDecorators.name: OracleTypeEnabled
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an upgrade path is removed.

eventDecorators.name: StabilityFeeChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an upgrade path is removed.

eventDecorators.name: TokenDebtLimitChanged
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an upgrade path is removed.

eventDecorators.name: VaultAccessGranted
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an upgrade path is removed.

eventDecorators.name: VaultAccessRevoked
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when an upgrade path is removed.

functionDecorators.name: setCollateral
functionDecorators.description: Only manager is able to call this function. Sets ability to use token as the main collateral.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the main collateral token.

parameterDecorators.name: stabilityFeeValue
parameterDecorators.description: The percentage of the year stability fee (3 decimals).

functionDecorators.name: setFoundation
functionDecorators.description: Only manager is able to call this function. Sets the foundation address.

functionDecorators.name: setLiquidationFee
functionDecorators.description: Only manager is able to call this function. Sets the percentage of the liquidation fee for a particular collateral.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the main collateral token.

functionDecorators.name: setManager
functionDecorators.description: Only manager is able to call this function. Grants and revokes manager's status of any address.

functionDecorators.name: setOracleType
functionDecorators.description: Only manager is able to call this function. Enables/disables oracle types.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the main collateral token.

functionDecorators.name: setStabilityFee
functionDecorators.description: Only manager is able to call this function. Sets the percentage of the year stability fee for a particular collateral.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the main collateral token.

functionDecorators.name: setTokenDebtLimit
functionDecorators.description: Only manager is able to call this function. Sets USDP limit for a specific collateral.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the main collateral token.

functionDecorators.name: setVaultAccess
functionDecorators.description: Only manager is able to call this function. Sets a permission for an address to modify the Vault.
